                               java.lang.String fieldName)
        Detect which alternative is the one containing character offsets. Note that there may not be such an alternative.
        Parameters:
        reader - the index reader
        fieldName - the field this property belongs under
        Returns:
        true if found, false if not

      • getOffsetsAlternative

        Returns:
